reviews.title: Good company but has gone corporate
reviews.pros: Overall not a bad company to work for. Really good colleagues who are always willing to share knowledge and help. Working conditions are really good. Nice office, flexible WFH policy.
reviews.cons: This company has gone full corporate. Top down decision making, not room for bottom up innovation (at least in the area where I work). Market has slowed down so it's hard to advance with no turnaround, and company is clearly in cost saving mode.

reviews.title: Great salary and Team, Limited Carreer Growth
reviews.pros: The company offers a competitive salary and a fantastic team environment, which makes for a supportive and enjoyable workplace.
reviews.cons: However, career advancement opportunities are limited unless you relocate to the headquarters. If you are seeking significant career growth, this may be a consideration.
